Distribution of software:

i3 KNX (released)
https://iridi.com/download/software/KNX_Home_Server/

i3 pro (released)
https://iridi.com/ru/download/software/v3/

Types of devices that can be controlled with Alexa: Climate, Dimmer, Relay, Light, Blinds, RGB Light

How to use iRidium Assistant skill in i 3pro app:
1. Register in i3pro. 
2. Create a server project in iRidium Studio.
3. Add Amazon Alexa (v3) Network device to your project.
4. Add subdevices to control and voice control to them.
5. Upload your project to your account on iRidium moble web-site.
6. Download a server project from the cloud (your account) to the server.
7. Install and start the app for Amazon Alexa voice assistant.
8. Choose iRidium Assistant skill.
9. Press «Link».
10. A window will appear, login using your login and password from iRidium mobile website. 
11. After successful authorization, choose i 3pro.
12. Choose the name of a required project press «Link».
13. Enter the name of the device from step 3 to connect. (Attention! The name of a device must be the same as the name in the project!)
14. Discover devices.

How to use the iRidium Assistant skill, for example, in i3 KNX app:
1. Register in the i3 KNX application and create a new project.
2. Add a voice control module.
3. Add your Amazon Alexa device to the configurator. Name it.
4. Select devices to control and add voice control to them.
5. Start the project and save it to the server.
6. Install and launch the Amazon Alexa voice assistant application.
7. Select the skill of the iRidium Assistant.
8. Press "Enable to use"
9. Login with your login and password of iRidium user in the window that appears.
10. Select the name of the project and click the "Link" button.
11. Enter the device name from step 3 to connect.
12. Do Discover Device.
